title: Coaching-Based Science Instructional Design Expert Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational instructional design theories and science-related professional experience
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused training for science sector managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Participants can effectively incorporate coaching feedback on science-related instructional design problems through VR simulations at least three times.
Participants can improve two or more instructional design project tasks by applying a peer leadership coaching model.
Participants can establish a professional development plan by writing a coaching-based reflective journal at the end of the mid-term course.

resources: Science Domain Instructional Design Case Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
